cause.description:
Guardian Angel home provides many services in Will County, Illinois.

Some of their services include:

The Sexual Assault Service Center is available to help survivors of sexual violence and their significant others in Will and Grundy Counties. Their sexual assault service has a 24/7 hotline, and they provide numerous services from counseling to legal advocates to help victims of sexual assault. 24/7 hotline 815.730.8984

Groundwork provides a safe temporary residence for abused women and their children, 24 hour accessibility. They also offer group and individual counseling.

B.A.S.E. is a before and after school enrichment program. We emphasize a wide variety of exciting and fun activities to assist children in school preparation and peer relationships. Our goal is to motivate a child’s desire to learn, grow and interact and assist the child in his/her academic success

Alternative school for BD children.

The Parent Aide program offers support and assistance to parents who are experiencing challenges as a parent. Parent Aides are trained, professionally supervised individuals, who assist parents under stress and those whose children may be at risk of abuse or neglect.. The parent aide provides this assistance in the home by developing a trusting relationship with the parent and by being a positive role model. They provide assistance with daily tasks such as finding transportation, budget planning, exploring child care options, household management, dealing with professionals and emergency needs.
